name: Boutique Nylon Headband Bowband Bow infant toddler Interchangeable Handmade
description: This listing is for ONE (1) nylon headband. Each headband is hand-sewn by me. Each headband has an interchangeable loop for attaching bows & clips and such. These headbands are SUPER soft & stretchy. They will not leave indents or marks on your child’s head. They are thin & very breathable for summer & the heat. They are one-size fits all. They will fit from newborn up to child-size. If they may get a little stretched out…just run them under cold water and let them air dry and they will retain their original shape. You may choose any color that I have available for this listing. The following colors are available: White, Black, Off-white/ivory, Peach, Mint Green, Navy blue, Crushed rose, Medium purple (Navy, ivory, & mint green not pictured) Get these now at a low price! Buy 1 or buy 1 in every color! (attachable bows not included—-please contact me for pricing of bows or see my other page for pricing of bows: http://www.myspace.com/KayleeBugBoutiqueBows and view all blogs.) DON’T BUY THIS!! BUY FROM MY ETSY PAGE INSTEAD! THIS IS JUST TO ADVERTISE MY ITEMS. GO TO: KAYLEEBUGBOUTIQUE.ETSY.COM for ordering, more pictures, details and such. Thanks!

name: Boutique Bows Small Loopy CUSTOM Baby Infant Toddler Girl clippy clip
description: This listing is for ONE (1) small loopy bow. This bow will be custom-made just for you! You can choose ANY color & ANY design/style. You can choose either a flat center or a knotted center. Photos are just examples of some that I’ve made. There are a ton of options. If there’s something specific that you would like (example: hot pink with white dots) just ask or let me know! I more than likely have it. These bows are hand-sewn by me--NO WIRE-and attached to an alligator clip. The clip is approximately 1 3/4” long…the bow is approximately 2-2.5 inches long. Small bow—perfect for babies or even toddlers & big girls! These bows are made with high-quality, 3/8” grosgrain ribbon and all the ends are heat-sealed to prevent fraying. I can also line these clips completely with extra ribbon for a “no-slip” clip that will hold onto the tiniest amount of hair (If you’d like your clips lined…it will be .20 cents extra each bow). (I strongly recommend the fully lined clips) Please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have! DON’T BUY THIS LISTING! PLEASE GO TO MY ETSY PAGE TO BUY THIS. THERE ARE MORE PHOTOS AND SUCH THERE. KAYLEEBUGBOUTIQUE.ETSY.COM Thanks!
